attributes.action: Stop giving handouts to people who don't want to work and have never contributed to this country's economy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Us hard working people of Great Britain are fed up of working 40 hour weeks and having to pay out hundreds of pounds per month in tax for it to be spent on the lazy freeloaders seeking benefits because they don't want to work or keep churning out babies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
